extendedInfo.description: -----------------------------------------Paid version of Ghost Detector 3DV open!!!------------------------------------------ This program is a free version of "Ghost Detector 3DV" which is downloaded by five hundred thousand people worldwidely.- This program has all basic features that are used by "Ghost Detector" and maintain 4 star grades in this field.- This program has a CPU speed of 800Mhz or more of your phone is recommended.- 800Mhz is less than or equal to [Ghost Detector 2D] use.[Description]Ghost Detector detects a ghost (phantom) as a form of radar Discovered ghost are marked by red dots.Ghost Detector use motions and microphones sensor on your smartphone like radar.Especially, it analyzes the wave length of MIC sensor by unique algorithm.When the sensitivity of the microphone is higher, it can search ghosts in a long distance.[Basic Algorithm]It extracts sounds of bandwidth wave that people couldnât listen.It filters specific sound waveform out and measures frequency of sound.When unusual frequency of sound occurs, it recognizes as ghost.[Instruction]* It canât work in the noisy place.* Sometimes it made a wrong response to electronic equipments.* When you operate it while you move in the unstable situation, program can be malfunction.* Detection ability can be changeable depend on your cell phoneâs microphone sensor sensitivity.* This program cannot be allowed for searching aliens or UFOs.* Made this program seriously but don't take results too seriously.

reviews.title: Ktoth
reviews.comment: I was freaked out ! As soon as I downloaded this app it went from a green screen to one red dot after another till there were a total of 6 dots all around me.
reviews.author: Kyle Toth

reviews.title: Strange
reviews.comment: I set my phone with airplane mode is on and turn wifi off. But still ghost be there.. how could be ??  it\'s strange.. and I stil believe it\'s fake .. sorry..
reviews.author: Hadi Suryadi

reviews.title: Don\'t Download To Detect Ghosts
reviews.comment: I KNEW IT I KNEW IT I KNEW! I KNEW THAT THIS APP IS A LOAD OF BULL! So I just use it to measure my Dubstep. :) :) :) Five stars just because I can see the sound waves fir my dubstep ;)
reviews.author: Ramiro Esquivel

reviews.title: Stupid but nice too scare little kids out
reviews.comment: How can a app in a phone prove there are ghosts in a house ?? This I\'s a load of garbage very poor app doesn\'t work !!!
reviews.author: Kyra clifford-marsh

reviews.title: Good prank app
reviews.comment: I guess this is a good prank app. Nothing special about it really, it just has a graph at the bottom that detects noise/sound. When I spoke the graph went crazy though it didn\'t impact the radar. I had several \"ghosts\" around me that kept popping in and out. Fun I guess for little kids to scare each other. Nothing more than a prank app.
reviews.author: Brittany Dunlap

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: It is terrible well it works but it said there was won inside of me and after I downloaded I haven\'t felt in control of my own body it felt like someone took over me..... but 5 stars cause it works
reviews.author: Abbi Castro

reviews.title: Is this real?
reviews.comment: seriously guys, is this app for real? coz i also installed other ghost detector and it only showed 1 or 2 dots/ghosts. and in this app it showed me 5 or more ghosts. so is this seriously real?
reviews.author: Elka Publico

reviews.title: Confused...
reviews.comment: I don\'t understand that where is the ghost. Sometime that moving to left and right. Sometime that is 10 change to 1 ghost. I have 2 app ghost detect. One is Ghost detect and one is this app. I think Ghost Detect App is good than this app but... don\'t know what to comment...
reviews.author: Salom Ngu

reviews.title: Freaky app.
reviews.comment: Its just a freaking app Wic makes u scary!! Any noise next to u appearz in read dot!
reviews.author: Sneha Prabhakar

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I think it\'s fake but good to make prank of little kids.
reviews.author: Shaquille Viyandita

reviews.title: PLEASE BELIEVE THIS..
reviews.comment: My 2.friends and I were using 2 cellphone, different carriers and models, one tablet. My phone at the time was using ghost radar classic as a spirit box. We noticed more than 8 entities forming a circle around us 3 with this radar...and my voice box immediately said..\"connected\" my friends got very scared I was not, I said we see you PLEASE say something now! Immediately after I finished, my box said \"nearby\" I felt a strong heavy presence. Be careful and do not fear what may happen. This WORKS!!!!
reviews.author: Mar Lee

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Used it and found something interesting one of the rooms in the house is haunted and when I checked there was a total of 2 ghost in there....great app though
reviews.author: Frank Jimenez

reviews.title: Unsure? ??
reviews.comment: You have to ask yourself are these devices even capable of radar?  , and other things as well such as night vision.  e.t.c so I\'ll give it a three. isn\'t stolen alien technology great!
reviews.author: David Lewis

reviews.title: Scary and works
reviews.comment: When we bought a house the guy that lived here before us loved old military parts and I was trying it out and four dots have surrounded me
reviews.author: Jacob Foster

reviews.title: Nice app.
reviews.comment: It freaks me out but when you are bored try it.
reviews.author: Gizan Vidad

reviews.title: Creepely weird
reviews.comment: It\'s good to entertain yourself and friends. If it is detecting somethin now that\'s the real kicker.
reviews.author: rafael montilla

reviews.title: Gretchen
reviews.comment: I wonder if this app is real cuz I saw one red dot n when u feel the spirit next to u u can\'t show fear cuz they live off fear n it never has bother me only my ex boyfriend n this girl I hate
reviews.author: Gretchen Hoover Miles

reviews.title: Not real
reviews.comment: My house is filled with ghost this app did not say  a ghost was around because my mtn dew spilled automaticly so good bye app
reviews.author: Nate White

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: Don\'t believe the haters. This detects three ghosts tops roaming the yard I\'ve gotten the exact same readings on another ghost detector! Two ghost detectors can\'t be completely in sync.
reviews.author: Edaina Moonrazor

reviews.title: Im scared!
reviews.comment: There was a ghost right next to me ahhhh!!! Scary!
reviews.author: Ciara Weston
